message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. Would you be willing to go down to $12000?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob! I can see that you're willing to pay $12000, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $13500. Let me know if that works for you!
I appreciate you coming down in price, Alice.  However, $13500 is still a bit higher than I'm willing to go. How about we split the difference and settle on $12750?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $13000, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal - I'll include a free upgrade and a 1-year warranty. What do you think?
